name: Rage Chicken 2
description:
Happiness is fleeting, the struggle is endless.

Rage Chicken 2 is a very difficult climbing game. You click and drag your mouse to direct your jump, and that's all you need to reach the end. The objective is simple - get to the top and escape.

  • Traverse detailed landscapes
  • Solve tricky jump puzzles
  • Tackle challenges at your own pace
  • Around 2 hours of gameplay, in theory. In practice this may take much longer.
  • Fall down repeatedly and lose your progress
  • Experience new and original flavours of frustration
  • Re-examine your life choices
  • Become one with the chicken

Epilepsy warning: contains some flashing elements.
